title: How to Have More Self Confidence and Love Yourself

steps.title: Carry yourself well.
steps.content: Carry yourself well. If you walk with your head up high and shoulders back, you feel great about yourself and others think you look great. How you feel about yourself is visible to others whether you think it is or not. Holding your head up, keeping your shoulders back, and offering a full or half smile conveys openness and confidence, and helps others react more positively to you.

steps.title: Eat healthily and treat your body right.
steps.content: Eat healthily and treat your body right. It will make you feel better. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Introduce yourself to new people and be yourself.
steps.content: Introduce yourself to new people and be yourself. It gives confidence when you make real friends, as they will appreciate you for who you are. [2] X Research source Visualize yourself approaching someone and experience what it's like to walk towards them while you're smiling and feeling positively about approaching them. Doing this can help you make yourself a little more open and extroverted.

steps.title: Smile at people and be friendly.
steps.content: Smile at people and be friendly. it’s a confidence booster when you know people like you.

steps.title: Believe in yourself.
steps.content: Believe in yourself. You don't even have to truly believe that you are amazing. If you act like you do, it will start to come naturally! Reader Poll: We asked 121 wikiHow readers if they think mantras and affirmations help boost their mood, and 74% of them said yes. [Take Poll] Repeating a mantra or affirmation can help you feel more confident!

steps.title: Don’t compare yourself to anyone.
steps.content: Don’t compare yourself to anyone. You are unique and people love that.

steps.title: Have a good time with everything you do.
steps.content: Have a good time with everything you do. Create fun and creative ways to have FUN! Do things you know will make you laugh.

steps.title: Stick up for yourself.
steps.content: Stick up for yourself. Never let someone tell you anything rude or disrespectful; they have no right. Just remember some people may only be kidding. You don't want to seem crazy by going off on them. Just politely tell them you don't appreciate their humor and laugh it off. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Try talking to someone you never thought you would want to talk to.
steps.content: Try talking to someone you never thought you would want to talk to. Don't judge people. Life is so much more interesting when you surround yourself with different people.

steps.title: Do things you love.
steps.content: Do things you love. It will make you have more confidence when you do something you love and you're good at it. People will notice your talents! [4] X Research source

steps.title: Do something you've never done before.
steps.content: Do something you've never done before. Facing your fears and doing something that intimidates you will really boost your confidence. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Wear something that you look good in!
steps.content: Wear something that you look good in! Heels are major confidence builder, especially when you can strut your stuff. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Fix your hair and makeup!
steps.content: Fix your hair and makeup! You can wear sweats and get away with it.

steps.title: Wear some nice perfume.
steps.content: Wear some nice perfume. It's amazing the confidence you feel when you smell good.

steps.title: Don't forget to smile!
steps.content: Don't forget to smile! This is the most important step of the whole thing!
